description: Manages ARP attributes of VXLAN on HUAWEI CloudEngine devices.

vbdif_name.description: Full name of VBDIF interface, i.e. Vbdif100.

bridge_domain_id.description: Specifies a BD(bridge domain) ID. The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

state.description: Determines whether the config should be present or not on the device.

evn_server.description: Configures the local device as the router reflector (RR) on the EVN network.

evn_peer_ip.description: Specifies the IP address of an EVN BGP peer. The value is in dotted decimal notation.

evn_source_ip.description: Specifies the source address of an EVN BGP peer. The value is in dotted decimal notation.

arp_collect_host.description: Enables EVN BGP or BGP EVPN to collect host information.

arp_suppress.description: Enables ARP broadcast suppression in a BD.

evn_reflect_client.description: Configures the local device as the route reflector (RR) and its peer as the client.

host_collect_protocol.description: Enables EVN BGP or BGP EVPN to advertise host information.
